segments.text: I find it curious how the children are working together in this secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The anticipation in the girl’s expression is almost palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks up at her brother, eager for a taste of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel her excitement radiating off of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But part of me feels uneasy; they're playing a dangerous game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene feels like a snapshot of childhood mischief, which is both amusing and alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would look up and see what’s happening, but she seems oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR
